titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain local tax debts to be collected through the reduction of Federal tax refunds.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/25/2009--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to direct the Secretary of the Treasury, upon receiving notice from a state or local government that a named individual owes a past-due legally enforceable tax obligation to a local goverment, to pay such tax debt from any federal tax refund due to such individual, after notifying such individual of the offset.
